content:
It's completely understandable that you may not find the appeal in watching gore and violence in horror movies. There are many other genres of movies and forms of entertainment that may be more appealing to you. 

People have different tastes, preferences, and motivations for watching different genres of movies. While some may appreciate the adrenaline rush of watching horror movies, others may prefer comedies, dramas, or action films. It's important to explore different forms of entertainment and find what resonates with you.

Ultimately, the value that individuals find in entertainment is subjective and unique to each person. There is no right or wrong answer when it comes to personal preferences.
